channel.title: CVE Feed for GurumNetworks -- GurumDDS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GurumNetworks -- GurumDDS

item.title: CVE-2021-38439|2024-08-04T01:44:22.260Z -- gurumnetworks -- gurumdds
item.description: All versions of GurumDDS are vulnerable to heap-based buffer overflow, which may cause a denial-of-service condition or remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2021-38423|2024-08-04T01:44:22.432Z -- gurumnetworks -- gurumdds
item.description: All versions of GurumDDS improperly calculate the size to be used when allocating the buffer, which may result in a buffer overflow.
